festival.introText:
Crooked House In The Park returns for 2023!

2021 saw the inception of something truly magical! A one-day festival that brought a star-studded lineup consisting of your favourite artists spanning House, Drum&Bass & UK Garage.

Lichfield City who is ready for round 3? This year we take things up a gear. Expect everything & more from our 2023 edition.

crookedinthepark.com

Brought to you by Crooked House Productions, 24 Market Street & 55 Bar.

R.O.A.R - 18+
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of Crooked House In The Park 2023. Get Crooked House In The Park tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com

reviews.body: Last entry at 3 pm!? Why wasnât this made clear, instead of being hidden in the small print. Absolute bulls**t, I will never buy a ticket to one of your events again.

faqs.question: When is Crooked House In The Park 2023?
faqs.answer:
Crooked House In The Park returns on Sunday 27th August 2023.

Doors open:11:00am
Last entry:3:00pm
Doors close:11:00pm

faqs.question: How much are Crooked House In The Park tickets?
faqs.answer: Ticket prices start at just £29.50 + booking fee for Earlybird.

faqs.question: Disabled access information
faqs.answer: If you require assistance regarding accessibility please get in contact via www.crookedhouseevents.com. There are free guestlist ticket for carers attending the festival. Please contact via www.crookedhouseevents.com for access to these.

faqs.question: Where is Crooked House In The Park?
faqs.answer: Crooked House in the Park 2023 is located at Beacon Park, 14 Swan Rd, Lichfield, WS13 6QZ.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately, we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

 

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: Is there accessible parking?
faqs.answer: The accessible car park is located about 30m from the festival site and is Free of Charge.

faqs.question: Does Crooked House In The Park have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer:
Crooked House In The Park is an 18+ event that operates a challenge 25 policy. Valid photographic ID will be required upon entry. ID’s that are accepted:

  • Passport (Physical Only)
  • A UK Driving License
  • A Proof of Age Card

Strictly no entry to those under the age of 18. Refunds will not be offered to those refused entry.

faqs.question: Will accessible toilets be available?
faqs.answer: There will be a number of accessible toilets located onsite.

faqs.question: Medical services
faqs.answer: There will be a number of first aid qualified members of staff on-site visible within the main arena if ever needed. You will be able to store medication if required.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own alcohol to the Crooked House In The Park?
faqs.answer: As a small independent festival bar sales are essential to keep the festival alive. There will be a selection of beers, ciders, spirits, wine & more across all areas of the festival.

faqs.question: Can I bring water & chairs to Crooked House In The Park?
faqs.answer:
Due to strict licensing conditions and being a dance event, chairs are not permitted onto site.

 

No liquids are allowed to be brought onsite due to licensing conditions.

faqs.question: What items are restricted from Crooked House In The Park?
faqs.answer:
The below items are not permitted at Crooked House In The Park:

  • Unauthorised Drones & Professional Cameras
  • Glass
  • Illegal Substances
  • Chairs & Gazebos
  • Animals
  • Legal Highs
  • Laser equipment / pens
  • Fireworks, flares
  • Any item which is considered a ‘weapon’
  • Any form of aerosols
  • Unauthorised items for trading
  • Food & Alcohol (Food & Drink available on site)
  • New Psychoactive Substances (NPS)

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Crooked House In The Park 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body:
what an amazing festival great DJs, great music, great vibes, I met some amazing friendly people.
what a way to celebrate my 40th in style.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Crooked House In The Park 2022
Review of Crooked House In The Park 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body:
Fabulous day , great venue , bigger than last yr and so well run . 
Friendly staff and felt very safe . 
Perfect .
